medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started in the left chest after a fatty meal and awoke the patient from sleep. It is associated with nausea and an episode of emesis. The patient believes he may have experienced similar pain once or twice before but never as severe. He denies fevers or chills at this time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: IVDU (Intravenous Drug Use), currently on suboxone for maintenance.
